description: TNF interacts with TNF receptor-1 (TNF-R1) to activate several signal transduction pathways.
TNF-R1 signaling is implicated in the pathogenesis of sepsis.
TNF-R1 signaling is implicated in the pathogenesis of diabetes.
TNF-R1 signaling is implicated in the pathogenesis of cancer.
TNF-R1 signaling is implicated in the pathogenesis of osteoporosis.
TNF-R1 signaling is implicated in the pathogenesis of multiple sclerosis.
TNF-R1 signaling is implicated in the pathogenesis of rheumatoid arthritis.
TNF-R1 signaling is implicated in the pathogenesis of inflammatory bowel diseases.
